title: How Star Guardian Urgot could work at this point
body:
{{champion:40}} {{champion:134}} have a dark, mysterious (get the meme I hope) and likely shared past... CarnivalKnights implied there is a connection between {{champion:142}} {{champion:134}}, so that kinda means Syndra is going down the path of being corrupted... On the boards, he replied to me regarding Star Guardian Urgot existence with this {{sticker:sg-janna}}, so maybe, MAYBE, he is involved in the corrupting Syndra and Zoe...

It makes sense Ahri, Jinx, Xayah rejecting and insulting him, because they are less than Fourth Years in the lore, they have absolutely no idea of his Star Guardian self that might just be the source of corruption.

He might just be the ultimate villain behind all, the one that plans to destroy the lights and take revenge for years of insults, imagine the skin paying nod to the jokery in effect wise to a degree, but make it equally unnerving at the same time, if they dare to go legendary+ way. 

Edit: Zoe's lore for Star Guardian skin is this: "A member of the ancient, first group of Star Guardians, Zoe's heart desired not love, but chaos -- twisting her newfound power into a malignant expression of cosmic madness. After numberless eons of hunting the First Star's chosen, she has finally come to Valoran City, hoping to destroy the latest generation of Guardians as she has countless others." 

CHAOS is the shtick of the 'Got, the one he thrives on. What if he truly is behind all, as the first guardian long forgotten by everyone? 

#Justice4StarGuardianUrgot

replies.body: It's going to be the ultimate skin for leagues 10 year anniversary.
Urgot can be the First Light from which all star guardian powers originate.....................
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Can we ... please... 
Please Carnival Knights. IAmCarlos. KateyKhaos. Whoever. I'm desperate at this point. 
I don't care if you have to hire 'interns' randomly off the street and it turns out being scarcely better than a 6 year olds fridge art.

***I Need my Invader Rek'Sai skin based on the SG: Invasion/Odyssey game modes!!!!***

Hey, I'm sorry to be that guy, but as some one really over interested in SG lore, Xayah was supposed to be the blue guardian if I'm not mistaken.  So... why is she primarily pink?  The only thing I got is that her gem fades to pink when she re-corrupts, so maybe it's something to do with that?

(im assuming you know the asnwer to this cuz of your title, sorry if you don't)

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TmUJVZru,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-08-29T00:01:19.966+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-janna}}

You are doing it again!!!! https://thumbs.gfycat.com/AptFrequentGypsymoth-small.gif

At least Riot should make Definitely Not Star Guardian Urgot skin for him on April Fools' Day or the true corrupted Star Guardian who's Light was taken by the First Star.
I don't understand that Riot:(
https://prnt.sc/oybukg

> [{quoted}](name=Pyrosan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TmUJVZru,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-28T09:03:13.111+0000)
>
> https://prnt.sc/oybukg

By saying this, it makes people want it more. Reverse psychology.
She just doesn't suspect anything. That means it's working.

> [{quoted}](name=Pyrosan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TmUJVZru,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-28T09:03:13.111+0000)
>
> https://prnt.sc/oybukg

His legacy shall live on 
https://d.facdn.net/art/galrock/1517775579/1517775579.galrock_star_guardian_ornn.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Pyrosan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TmUJVZru,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-28T09:03:13.111+0000)
>
> https://prnt.sc/oybukg

Classic Riot misdirection.

At this point i'm not sure who would or would not buy it, but its quite the comunity meme and deserves to be made true. He has been doing legs day, all days for that exact moment, and he has been waiting for a while now

I think Urgot can be creatively made into a star guardian and not be this 'ugly' or frilly outfit on a 'macho/edgey' star guardian.

But I dont know if people would be disappointed because that is half the meme people expect...


Maybe we will get star guardian urgot one day. I'm hoping for Taric first however ;)

> [{quoted}](name=Galiö,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TmUJVZru,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-08-29T16:04:01.643+0000)
>
> I think Urgot can be creatively made into a star guardian and not be this 'ugly' or frilly outfit on a 'macho/edgey' star guardian.
> 
> But I dont know if people would be disappointed because that is half the meme people expect...
> 
> 
> Maybe we will get star guardian urgot one day. I'm hoping for Taric first however ;)

Exactly, i think Taric fits the theme so well, shame that taric has a low playerbase tho.

Honestly I imagined Urgot to be a monstrous guardian that the star itself has chosen for mysterious reasons.

But this one works too. Urgot could be a villain capable of devouring stars as well as corrupting the guardians.

For a skin line that's inspired from sailor moon, Urgot weirdly enough happens to fit well despite being all a cutesy theme but quite frankly, even sailor moon had its dark and fucked up moments that riot probably wouldn't even dare go with it.

If Urgot is **not** actually a Star Guardian, but an ancient being that is the major threat in this universe and the actual reason why the first star has recruited the Star Guardians in the first place, while having the power to corrupt these Star Guardians for his own plans, yeah, that might work.
Let the meme die, y'all have ran it into the dirt...

> [{quoted}](name=Overlord Mengsk,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TmUJVZru,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-08-28T16:27:59.290+0000)
>
> Let the meme die, y'all have ran it into the dirt...

Its not a meme.
I genuinely want SG Urgot. Like not even as a joke I want it
